data.text: First of a fabled line. Ethiopian first registered aircraft ET-T-1 which gave the airline 16 years of service, clocking up more than 20 thousand hours of flying time, versus The Ethiopian Airbus A350,one of the latest 16 ultra-luxuries aircraft the Airline currently has.#75Years https://t.co/QUqDbiwtLF
RT @RollsRoyce: Congratulations to @FlyEthiopian as you celebrate 75 years as a national flag carrier. We are proud to power your latest ge…
Ramadan Mubarak from all of us at Ethiopian Airlines! #EthiopianAirlines #75YearsofExcellence https://t.co/8s0elRRZuh

RT @EleniGabre: Love me my airline! Happy Birthday!
#proudEthiopian #PlatinumAllTheWay @flyethiopian https://t.co/PKvtIxdVQ1
As we celebrate 75 years of excellence, we take stock of our accomplishments over three quarters of a century. Ethiopian Airlines Group CEO Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam https://t.co/MMgovt6MIl
@AshenafiTeklu3 Dear Sir/Madam, so beautiful, Thank you for sharing!and we look forward for more pictures.

No better place to realize your childhood aviation dreams than a proud owner of 75 years of experience.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/mMWYteQBF8

Ethiopian 75th Anniversary celebration at Ethiopian Airlines Head Quarter. 

#75YearsofExcellence #ET75 #flyethiopian https://t.co/SRMvE5bsdr

Standing together, we will carry our legacy to many generations to come.
#FlyEthiopian #75YearsofExcellence #ET75 https://t.co/13iqErculp

A special event was held on Tonight’s Ethiopian flight to Cairo, commemorating our first ever international flight from Addis to Cairo on the 8th of April 1946, 75 years back!
#75YearsofExcellence #ET75 #flyethiopian https://t.co/kQnwBOoTf6
Dear @MoghaluKingsley, Thank you very much for your kind note. We are happy that you celebrated our 75th anniversary with us. #75YearsofExcellence  #ET75 https://t.co/XwG2vnwIND

75 years ago today,in 1946, Ethiopian Airlines operated its 1st scheduled flight with Douglas C-47 Skytrain aircraft from Addis Ababa to Cairo via Asmara.Happy 75th anniversary to our valued customers & all hard working employees who made the airline shine high in the sky. #ET75 https://t.co/WEnvR0ZEPH

We’ve come this far, being a proud national flag carrier, inspiring Africa & connecting the world. 
75 Years young! 
#75YearsofExcellence #HappyBirthdayEthiopian #ET75 #flyethiopian https://t.co/5wPcg6mr8a
